original_text: Thou didst strike through with his staves the head of his villages: they came out as a whirlwind to scatter me: their rejoicing was as to devour the poor secretly.
korean_text: 그들이 회오리바람처럼 이르러 나를 흩으려 하며 가만히 가난한 자 삼키기를 즐거워하나 오직 주께서 그들의 전사의 머리를 그들의 창으로 찌르셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Thou didst strike through with his staves
they came out as a whirlwind
their rejoicing was as to devour the poor secretly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 기쁨은 가난한 자를 비밀리에 삼키는 것과 같았습니다
